scenes.description: A slideshow of numerous fan messages and illustrations celebrating Shirakami Fubuki's 1st Solo Live.
View of the large audience at Ariake Arena waiting for the start of the live concert. An announcement starts.

subtitles.original:
FBKINGDOM ANTHEM
- Shirakami Fubuki 1st Solo Live -
subtitles.english:
FBKINGDOM ANTHEM
- Shirakami Fubuki 1st Solo Live -

subtitles.original: 本日は、白上フブキ 1stソロライブ
subtitles.english: Today, at Shirakami Fubuki's 1st Solo Live

subtitles.original: 「FBKINGDOM ANTHEM」にご来場いただき、ありがとうございます。
